tossed outside off, driven to extra-cover
full on middle, played back to the bowler
full and slanting in at off from over the wicket, holds up in the pitch. Dimuth is early into a drive and chips it in front of mid-on
back of a length and angling into the hips, picked off to long leg
short at the body from round the stumps, fended off to cover
short on the hips, tickled behind square
short at the body again, drops the ball to cover and hares across to the other end
short and outside leg, swivels on the back foot and flaps a pull to long leg
short and wide outside off, cut to cover
just keeps that out. Arm ball headed for off stump from a good length. Gets deep in the crease and jams it out
length outside off, turning away. Left alone
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
past the edge. Sure plays the cut a lot. Length and into the corridor. Skids under his bat
length on off stump, defended into the covers
handsomely pulled to deep square's left. Short ball not quite climbing up. Huffs and puffs up to his chest and he's on top of it
nicely done again. Short and up the hips. Gets off the floor and glances to fine leg
hooked past backward square, to deep square's left. Short balls sitting up nicely at a middle stump line
goes with the short ball again, and it's hooked comfortable once more. Straight to backward square leg though
yorker down leg side, can't connect on the flick
length and tailing into the pads. Flicked uppishly to fine leg
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
length outside off, leans in and jabs at it. Spins away but he gets it into the turf
tossed up outside off, pushed to point's left
length outside off, left alone
length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
short of a length outside off, left alone
flighted outside off and breaking down the leg side, away from the reach of Thirimanne's glance
much fuller on off, driven to Williamson at short midwicket
Santner dangles it up outside off, no real turn, driven off the front foot again, this time to cover
full and wider outside off, blocked off the front foot
flighted and outside off, played back to the bowler
flatter and on off, dead-batted
speared outside off, down the track and hit back to the bowler
Dimuth uses his feet and flicks to midwicket
full and outside off, Dimuth gets across off and falls over the flick
eased down to mid-on after coming down the track once again
looped up outside off, swept flat and hard to deep square leg
tossed on a fourth-stump line, Thirimanne bends forward and smothers it
flatter and just a shade outside off, reverse-swept away fine of deep third man
full and outside off, clipped through square leg
on a length and turns back in, played with soft hands to the left of short leg
tossed on off, defended back to the bowler
skids on outside off, patted to point via an open face
slower through the air and outside off, Dimuth jumps down the track and stabs it back to the bowler
Dimuth shimmies out and works this with the break to midwicket
clipped to left of short midwicket
flat on off, defended
pushed through just outside off, reverse-swept away to the off-side sweeper
here comes Dimuth, down the track, meets this pitch of this full ball and sends it purring through midwicket with a top-quality flick
dangled up outside off and turns away a wee bit, Thirimanne reaches out for the ball and carves to point
starts outside off and spins away sharply, no shot from Thirimanne
shorter and turns away outside off, ignored again
pushed through flatter and quicker on middle and leg, Thirimanne presses forward and plays it back to Somerville
much fuller and curves away outside off, defended with the break to cover
on a length and outside off, 92ks, safely negotiated off the back foot
pushed through on middle, uses his feet and flicks to midwicket
good length and spins in on middle with some extra bounce to foil Dimuth's attempt to sweep it away

shorter and turns in, Dimuth goes on the back foot and plays a full-blooded flick. It carries low to Latham, but he can't close his fingers around the ball. It was just too quick for him. So, Latham drops a tough chance at short leg
on a length and wide of off, reverse-swept over backward point
worked with the spin to square leg off the back foot
full and outside off, run away to backward point with soft hands
pushed through outside off, driven through the line to extra-cover
slower offbreak, shorter, chopped to second slip on the bounce
slider, fizzes off the pitch, 95ks dart beats the outside edge
full on the stumps, keeps a bit low, but defended safely
shorter and spins away outside off, lashed away in the air...but to the right of backward point for four. Dimuth has been quite lucky to survive a few chances, and he is making the most of them here
on a length and slides on outside off, Thirimanne waits for the ball to arrive, then dabs to third man
Dimuth skips out, but is beaten is flight, and winds up wearing it on the thigh pad
fuller on middle and leg, deflects a sweep to short fine leg
tossed outside off, Dimuth dashes down the track and smears it over midwicket like a boss. Pinged off the middle of the bat. What a way to bring up the 150 stand
flatter and outside off, uses his feet once again, this time he drives along the ground to long-on
flighted and outside off, square-driven to point
pushed through outside off, Thirimanne loosens his grip and defends with soft hands
on a length, spins and bounces outside off, left alone
shorter and spins away outside off, Thirimanne rides the bounce and punches to point with an open face
fuller, starts outside off and breaks away further, no shot
full and angling into middle from round the wicket, Thirimanne covers up in defence
flighted and on off, dead-batted away
spinning in from just a shade outside to catch the pad, but this is breaking down the leg side
back of a length and outside off, stabbed off the back foot to short midwicket
uses his feet and taps a single down to long-on
skids into off stump, hastily jabbed to short midwicket from the crease
dragged down outside off, cracked off the back foot to sweeper on the off side
full toss, dipping in, and defended off the front foot

huuuuuge appeal for lbw but not given. Full, on middle, and he goes for an expansive sweep. Misses the shot, and New Zealand review. There's no bat involved, so what will ball-tracking show? It shows ball hitting leg stump, so the umpire needs to change his decision. First wicket
chance! But flying past short leg. Full, on off and turning into him. Tries to flick, but it was in the air
up and over! Comes down the wicket to this full ball, and whips it over midwicket with the spin
full, on off and turning in. Driven to the leg side
over long on this time! Another full ball turning into Mendis, and he skips down the wicket before lofting it over the non-striker.
full, just outside off, and he comes down the ground to flick. Finds midwicket
guided fine! Length ball outside off, and he plays a late nudge past first slip
full, on off, and he comes down the wicket before closing the bat's face. Guided to square leg
length ball, outside off. Mendis shapes to cut this square, but mistimes it back to the bowler
full, outside off, and he tries to sweep. Wedges the shot, and that's gone straight to midwicket. Too full a delivery, and Mendis failed to get under that ball. Two wickets in two overs!
full, just outside off, and he prods forward to block
full, just outside off, and checked to cover
length ball, outside off, and turning further away. Cut square to point
length ball, on middle, and skidding through. Nudged off his pads to backward square leg

cries of 'catch it' but Mathews gets off the mark. Somerville bowls from over the wicket, landing it on a length and getting the ball to turn in. Mathews flicks off his waist square, and it whizzes past his right hand
full, on middle, and tapped back to the bowler
full, on off, and this is a faster delivery to end the over. Tapped to mid-on
overpitched, just outside off, and the attempted drive has been toe-ended to long off
full, just outside off, and he skips down the ground to mistimed a drive. Finds midwicket
length ball, just outside off and turning inwards. The attempted nudge hits his pad instead
full, just outside off, and he uses his feet to meet the ball. Driven to long on
full, on off, and he defends with soft hands. Ball lands just short of silly mid-off
full, on middle, and tapped with soft hands once more
full outside off, and turning further away. Left alone
full outside off, and defended against the turn to the off side
length ball outside off, and turning further away. No feet movement, but cut nonetheless to point
faster ball, skidding into his pads, and flicked behind square to fine leg. Moves to 98
length ball, on off stump. Nudged off his pads to midwicket
tossed up, landing just outside off and turning in. Mistimed to square leg for a quick run
full, on off, and drilled to long on for his 99th run of the innings
full, on off stump. Pushed into the gap near short cover for a quick single
lofted through cow corner! Full, on off, and he's not afraid to use his feet. Gets it over the infield and raises his bat to soak in the applause. Ninth Test ton
full, on off, and he drives down the ground to long on
full, on middle stump. Blocked
fullish, outside off, and he makes room before cutting square through the point region!
full, on off stump. Defended back to the bowler
drops just short of first slip! Length ball outside off, and he tries to play the late cut, but plays it too fine. Falls just in front of the diving Taylor
full, on middle, and guided with the bat's closed face to the leg side
full, just outside off, and tapped away to KW at cover
length ball, on off and skidding into his body. Punched off the back foot to mid-on
full, on middle, and defended straight back to Santner. Time for drinks
full, outside off, and driven to cover for a quick single
length ball, on off and turning in. Flicked to the leg side
full, just outside off, and drilled to long on
full outside off, and pushed to cover point
full outside off, and turning away. Driven to wide mid-off
full, on middle and turning into his pads. Tries to work it leg-side but the ball hits the front pad
full, just outside off, and driven to long on
full, on middle stump. Defended back to the bowler
short, wide outside off, and cut in front of square. Too easy for a man who is on triple-digits. Team 200 too
length ball, on off, and flicked to deep midwicket for a jogging single
full, just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to block
full outside off, and turning away. Defended with the bat's open face
full, on off, and he gets down to paddle a sweep fine past the keeper's right. A couple more for Sri Lanka
full, outside off, and chopped away to cover
length ball, outside off, and tapped off the back foot
full outside off, and cut behind square. Finds point
length ball, outside off, and cut to point once again
on a length and holds its line outside off, comes very slow off the pitch. Mathews adjusts and plays it back to the bowler
fuller than a good length and outside off, Mathews reaches out for the ball and jabs it down to mid-off
good length and holds its line outside off again, patted to short cover off the front foot
shortish and on off, Mathews gets right behind the line in defence
Mathews jumps across off and flicks a middle-stump ball to deep midwicket
short and fizzes through to the keeper as Dimuth lets it go outside off
spinning down the leg side, Mathews shuffles across, but still can't touch it. The keeper is beaten down the leg side as well. Byes
tossed on middle, glanced down to fine leg
flighted and wide outside off, swept flat and hard to deep square leg
looped up on off, forward and smothered
shorter and turns quickly into the pads, whipped to deep midwicket
on a length and just a shade outside of, defended to cover off the front foot
shorter and on a fourth-stump line, Mathews gets on top of it and pats it down
short and wider of off, Mathews fends it off
Mathews shuffles across off stump and defends this middle-stump ball to short midwicket
pitched up and outside off, driven to the right of short cover and left of mid-off
full and angling across off, Dimuth covers his off stump and shoulders arms
back of a length and breaks back in on middle, Mathews goes on the back foot and whisks the ball away to short midwicket
pushed through on middle and leg, blocked with the break to short leg
Mathews jumps down the track, meets the pitch of this full ball outside off, and laces it down to long-on
flighted and outside off, Dimuth rolls out a sweep and places it to the right of deep square leg
slider outside off, Dimuth aims to drag it to the leg side with a sweep, but misses it altogether
flatter and outside off, drilled to extra-cover off the front foot
back of a length and outside off, punched to short cover off the front foot
on a length and outside off, driven to the left of short cover
shortish and outside off, nothing doing from Mathews
fuller and outside off, pushed to short cover
overpitched and outside off, laced to the straighter of the two short covers
darted full and outside off. Mathews can't quite get underneath the length and squeezes to mid-off
full and spins away outside off, guided to point
tossed outside off, shovel-swept away to deep square leg
back of a length and spins in towards off, clipped off the back foot to square leg
shorter and outside off, whipped with the break to short midwicket
full on the stumps, driven down to wide long-on
good length and outside off, neatly swept away to deep square leg once again

Dimuth nicks off! Nevertheless, this has been a fine innings from the SL captain. Fullish and swerving away outside off from over the wicket, possibly a hint of reverse-swing. Dimuth plays a long way away from the body. Lazy drive, this, and he can only edge it behind to Watling. SL 50 away from victory
on a length and outside off, clattered on the up to extra-cover
full and wide outside off, Kusal swishes and misses
full and hung up outside off, Kusal doesn't bite
back of a length and kicks up outside off, no shot from Kusal
on a length and outside off, cross-seamer, clattered on the up once again, this time in the gap to the right of extra-cover, and left of sweeper cover. Bam!
full and dips on middle, Mathews bunts the ball away to short midwicket
shorter and spins in, punched off the back foot to deep midwicket
shortish and skids on, too close to the off stump for a cut. Kusal still goes for it, bottom-edging it, and nutmegging Watling behind the stumps
dangled up outside off, Kusal deploys a big stride and belts it away past mid-off for four

Kusal has been given out caught behind. He challenges the on-field out decision. Somerville is a tall spinner and he often extracts extra bounce. Good length on middle, kicks up at Kusal, as he aims for a reverse-sweep. He lobs it to second slip. Has this ballooned off the glove or forearm? No contact with bat/glove. Forearm it is and Kusal survives. They now have to check for lbw, impact may have been outside the line. The tracker returns umpire's call
tossed up and spins away outside off, Kusal aims to hoist it over extra cover, but ends up slicing it to point
back of a length and holds its line outside off, ignored
pitched up and outside off, driven through the line to long-off
on a length and outside off, Kusal jumps across off, sizes it up and clouts it to the midwicket boundary
fuller and slanting away outside off, no shot
back of a length and angling away outside off, Kusal reaches out for the ball, jabs at it, before tucking his bat away from the line
back of a length and outside off, cutter, shovelled away with the bottom wrist. Bunted straight down the ground past the bowler. Some shot, that
Mathews steps down the track and defends this full ball on off back to Somerville
back of a length and skids back into middle, Mathews does not make contact with a flick
down the track and driven down to long-on

pushed through flatter and quicker, Kusal aims for a big reverse-sweep, but does not touch it. The lbw appeal is shot down. Is the impact outside the line? Williamson calls for a review. Yes, the impact is outside the line of off. Good call from umpire Gough
chopped from middle-stump to extra-cover
shorter and outside off, shovelled off the back foot through square leg

full, on middle, and that's a huge lbw appeal! Mathews wasn't quick enough to prod forward, but Boult's appeal is turned down. Was that bat first? Surely must be the only reason since NZ did not review --- and yes, replaces confirm it - big inside edge
full, on off, and he prods forward to drive. Struck well, but finds cover
full, just outside off, and tapped with soft hands towards cover for a quick run
yorker at the base of off stump, but swings slightly away, and it misses the base of off stump. Perera fails to dig it away - completely done in by the pace and swing
full outside off, and hammered over cover! Let's his hands fly, and finds the connection to clear the infield
length ball, on middle, and turning down the leg side. Mathews looks to flick and misses, and very nearly gets stumped since his back leg was in the air for a slight moment
length, on middle, and he rocks deep into his crease before hammering a grounded pull through deep midwicket
length ball on leg stump, and turning inwards further. Hits his front leg
length ball, on middle, and turned inwards. Flicked to short fine leg
full, just outside off, and flicked off his pads to short leg
full, on leg stump, and defended towards cover
length ball, on off stump, and the ball moves slightly away. Tries to punch off the back foot, and misses
muscled, but taken at mid on! Length ball, angling into his body, and he's cramped for space while trying to loft it over midwicket. Mistimed, and Santner runs to his left to complete the catch
full, on middle, and the leg-side flick finds midwicket
length ball, on middle, and flicked to midwicket. Finds the fielder
full and wide outside off, and crunched through the point region! Nice use of the wrists
length ball, on middle. Tapped off the back foot to the leg side
full, on middle, and nudged with the bat's closed face to midwicket
length ball, wide outside off, and cut square off the back foot to deep point. They walk across for one
full outside off, and he leans forward to drive. Can't get the gap
length ball, on middle, and flicked off his pads past backward square leg. Boult can't cut it off, and now Sri Lanka need only nine runs to win
length ball, outside off, and punched to cover
full and wide outside off, and he shoulders his arms
back of a length, on leg stump, and he ducks under the ball
length ball, outside off, and punched to cover
full and wide outside off, and the attempted drive is caressed to cover
pulled behind square but for just a single. Short ball on leg stump this time
full, on middle, and tapped back to the bowler
full, just outside off, and driven straight past the bowler. Chase for Santner to long off, but he manages to pull things back
back of a length, outside off, and punched. Finds cover though
full, just outside off, and tapped back with soft hands
full outside off, and the straight drive hits the stumps at the bowler's end. Ball ricochets to long on as they walk across for one
shotttt! Length ball, wide outside off, but he goes Nataraja to pull through midwicket
length ball outside off, and he shoulders his arms this time
length ball, just outside off, and he shoulders his arms once more! Dhananjaya teasing the rule-book now
length ball, on middle, and flicked to backward square! Sri Lanka win by six wickets
